name: Unstuffed Cabbage Roll
author: tlc_adams
summary: This is a quick and easy main dish. My kids don't even like cabbage, but they love this. I usually try to serve it with green beans, new potatoes, corn, and a pan of corn bread. They eat over half the pan every time. Also, the longer it stands the better it tastes.
directions: Heat a Dutch oven or large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef and onion in the hot Dutch oven until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease
Add cabbage, tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, garlic, salt, and pepper and bring to a boil
Cover Dutch oven, reduce heat, and simmer until cabbage is tender, about 30 minutes
